# Slick, Greater (Arm/ShldSpcAb)
## Overview
As *[[Slick (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|slick]]*, except it grants a +15 competence bonus on [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]] checks.

Strong conjuration; CL 15th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Grease (Spell)|grease]]**;* Price +33,750 gp.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 464
